#Scotland #VisitScotland #OnlyinScotland #StaySafe

node.accessibility_caption: Photo shared by VisitScotland on August 28, 2021 tagging @historybyvictoria. May be an image of tree, monument and nature.

node.text:
Fancy a trip to the sunny city of Dundee? Here are some recommendations! 😎

No visit to Dundee is complete without a wee stroll down the quiet & picturesque Strawberry Bank 🍓 To tick some history & culture off your list, stop by @mcmanusdundee and browse the 8 galleries they have on offer 🖼 Take a wander to Dundee’s iconic waterfront to visit Scotland’s very first museum of design, the architecturally stunning @vadundee. While you’re there, don’t forget to grab a bit to eat – sample @heatherstreetfood’s delicious bagels & doughnuts as a wee treat! 😋 On the outskirts of Dundee, you’ll find the beautifully preserved Claypotts Castle with its timber roof still intact! 🏰 If you’re feeling peckish from all that exploring, grab a juicy burger from @thegiddygoosedundee to enjoy in their gorgeous beer garden 🍔🌺 Lastly, discover Dundee’s textile heritage in the wonderfully refurbished Verdant Works jute mill, dating back to 1833! 🤩

Where is first on your list of places to visit in Dundee? 💭

📷 Strawberry Bank: @historybyvictoria
📷 McManus Galleries: @barefootwayne
📷 V&A Museum: @michaelexploring
📷 Heather Street Food: @emmyeatsalot
📷 Claypotts Castle: @tierrasaltasescocia
📷 The Giddy Goose: @thegiddygoosedundee 
📷 Verdant Works: @visitscotland

#Dundee #VisitDundee #VisitScotland #TayCountry #LoveGreatBritain #Scotland
